sections.title: Prometheus Consulting & Production Implementation
sections.description: Our experts analyze your application framework and provide the best approach to implement and configure Prometheus following industry best practices.
offerings: In-depth system and monitoring requirement analysis to provide a cohesive solution.
Proper instrumentation of your codebase to expose metrics in Prometheus.
Labeling and structuring metrics for easier consumption and production readiness.

sections.title: Incident Management
sections.description: Track and respond to incidents faster using Prometheus metrics. Our experts guide you through efficient incident management.
offerings: Setup of Prometheus Alertmanager for real-time incident tracking.
Creation of alerts based on collected metrics.
Analyze metrics to optimize incident response, reducing time and effort.
Use exporters to collect additional metrics for post-mortem analysis.

sections.title: Data Modeling & Querying
sections.description: Our team ensures your Prometheus setup can provide meaningful insights through proper data modeling and querying.
offerings: Model, label, and aggregate data for simpler consumption.
Leverage PromQL to extract insights and meaningful metrics.

sections.title: Integration with Third-Party Tools
sections.description: Enhance Prometheus’ capabilities by integrating with other tools seamlessly.
offerings: Grafana dashboards for visually compelling, actionable metrics.
Alertmanager integration with tools like PagerDuty for real-time notifications.
Configure KEDA to auto-scale applications based on custom metrics.

sections.title: Prometheus Commercial Support & Training
sections.description: As an officially recognized Prometheus commercial support partner, we guide you through your end-to-end monitoring journey.
offerings: Upskill your team with best practices and knowledge transfer.
Master Prometheus concepts and resolve deployment or configuration issues.
Build a future-ready team proficient in Prometheus operations.
